CustomField.description: This field controls the visibility of dynamic action of "Re-Evaluate Assessment" button on Assessment record detail lightning page.
CustomField.formula: AND ( Is_Viewed_By_Manager__c , TODAY() - DATEVALUE( Date_Time_of_the_Evaluation__c ) <=30, ISPICKVAL( Re_Evaluation_Status__c , 'Requested') , Re_Evaluation_Completed_Count__c < 2 )
CustomField.label: Display Re-evaluate Action Button?
